4609 
4610 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
4611  HTREEITEM MapAccIDToHTREEITEM(UINT uID) const
4612  {
4613  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4614  return (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_MAPACCIDTOHTREEITEM, uID, 0L);
4615  }
4616 
4617  UINT MapHTREEITEMToAccID(HTREEITEM hTreeItem) const
4618  {
4619  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4620  return (UINT)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_MAPHTREEITEMTOACCID, (WPARAM)hTreeItem, 0L);
4621  }
4622 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
4623 
4624 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
4625  void ShowInfoTip(HTREEITEM hItem)
4626  {
4627  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4628  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_SHOWINFOTIP, 0, (LPARAM)hItem);
4629  }
4630 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
4631 };
4632 
4633 typedef CTreeViewCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CTreeViewCtrl;
4634 
4635 
4637 // CTreeViewCtrlEx
4638 
4639 // forward declaration
4640 template <class TBase> class CTreeViewCtrlExT;
4641 
4642 // Note: TBase here is for CTreeViewCtrlExT, and not for CTreeItemT itself
4643 template <class TBase>
4644 class CTreeItemT
4645 {
4646 public:
4647  HTREEITEM m_hTreeItem;
4648  CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>* m_pTreeView;
4649 
4650 // Construction
4651  CTreeItemT(HTREEITEM hTreeItem = NULL, CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>* pTreeView = NULL) : m_hTreeItem(hTreeItem), m_pTreeView(pTreeView)
4652  { }
4653 
4654  CTreeItemT(const CTreeItemT<TBase>& posSrc)
4655  {
4656  *this = posSrc;
4657  }
4658 
4659  operator HTREEITEM() { return m_hTreeItem; }
4660 
4661  CTreeItemT<TBase>& operator =(const CTreeItemT<TBase>& itemSrc)
4662  {
4663  m_hTreeItem = itemSrc.m_hTreeItem;
4664  m_pTreeView = itemSrc.m_pTreeView;
4665  return *this;
4666  }
4667 
4668 // Attributes
4669  CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>* GetTreeView() const { return m_pTreeView; }
4670 
4671  BOOL operator !() const { return m_hTreeItem == NULL; }
4672 
4673  BOOL IsNull() const { return m_hTreeItem == NULL; }
4674 
4675  BOOL GetRect(LPRECT lpRect, BOOL bTextOnly) const;
4676  BOOL GetText(LPTSTR lpstrText, int nLen) const;
4677 #ifndef _ATL_NO_COM
4678  BOOL GetText(BSTR& bstrText) const;
4679 #endif // !_ATL_NO_COM
4680 #if defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
4681  BOOL GetText(_CSTRING_NS::CString& strText) const;
4682 #endif // defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
4683  BOOL SetText(LPCTSTR lpszItem);
4684  BOOL GetImage(int& nImage, int& nSelectedImage) const;
4685  BOOL SetImage(int nImage, int nSelectedImage);
4686  UINT GetState(UINT nStateMask) const;
4687  BOOL SetState(UINT nState, UINT nStateMask);
4688  DWORD_PTR GetData() const;
4689  BOOL SetData(DWORD_PTR dwData);
4690  BOOL SetItem(UINT nMask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage, int nSelectedImage, UINT nState, UINT nStateMask, LPARAM lParam);
4691 
4692 // Operations
4693  CTreeItemT<TBase> InsertAfter(LPCTSTR lpstrItem, HTREEITEM hItemAfter, int nImageIndex)
4694  {
4695  return _Insert(lpstrItem, nImageIndex, hItemAfter);
4696  }
4697 
4698  CTreeItemT<TBase> AddHead(LPCTSTR lpstrItem, int nImageIndex)
4699  {
4700  return _Insert(lpstrItem, nImageIndex, TVI_FIRST);
4701  }
4702 
4703  CTreeItemT<TBase> AddTail(LPCTSTR lpstrItem, int nImageIndex)
4704  {
4705  return _Insert(lpstrItem, nImageIndex, TVI_LAST);
4706  }
4707 
4708  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetChild() const;
4709  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNext(UINT nCode) const;
4710  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextSibling() const;
4711  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetPrevSibling() const;
4712  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetParent() const;
4713  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetFirstVisible() const;
4714  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextVisible() const;
4715  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetPrevVisible() const;
4716  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetSelected() const;
4717  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetDropHilight() const;
4718  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetRoot() const;
4719 #if !defined(_WIN32_WCE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
4720  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetLastVisible() const;
4721 #endif // !defined(_WIN32_WCE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
4722 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0600)
4723  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextSelected() const;
4724 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0600)
4725  BOOL HasChildren() const;
4726  BOOL Delete();
4727  BOOL Expand(UINT nCode = TVE_EXPAND);
4728  BOOL Select(UINT nCode);
4729  BOOL Select();
4730  BOOL SelectDropTarget();
4731  BOOL SelectSetFirstVisible();
4732  HWND EditLabel();
4733  HIMAGELIST CreateDragImage();
4734  BOOL SortChildren(BOOL bRecurse = FALSE);
4735  BOOL EnsureVisible();
4736  CTreeItemT<TBase> _Insert(LPCTSTR lpstrItem, int nImageIndex, HTREEITEM hItemAfter);
4737  int GetImageIndex() const;
4738 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
4739  BOOL SetInsertMark(BOOL bAfter);
4740 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
4741 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
4742  UINT MapHTREEITEMToAccID() const;
4743 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
4744 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
4745  void ShowInfoTip();
4746  BOOL GetPartRect(TVITEMPART partID, LPRECT lpRect) const;
4747 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
4748 };
4749 
4750 typedef CTreeItemT<ATL::CWindow> CTreeItem;
4751 
4752 
4753 template <class TBase>
4754 class CTreeViewCtrlExT : public CTreeViewCtrlT< TBase >
4755 {
4756 public:
4757 // Constructors
4758  CTreeViewCtrlExT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : CTreeViewCtrlT< TBase >(hWnd)
4759  { }
4760 
4761  CTreeViewCtrlExT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
4762  {
4763  m_hWnd = hWnd;
4764  return *this;
4765  }
4766 
4767 // Operations (overides that return CTreeItem)
4768  CTreeItemT<TBase> InsertItem(LPTVINSERTSTRUCT lpInsertStruct)
4769  {
4770  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4771  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_INSERTITEM, 0, (LPARAM)lpInsertStruct);
4772  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, this);
4773  }
4774 
4775  CTreeItemT<TBase> InsertItem(LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage,
4776  int nSelectedImage, HTREEITEM hParent, HTREEITEM hInsertAfter)
4777  {
4778  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4779  return InsertItem(TVIF_TEXT | TVIF_IMAGE | TVIF_SELECTEDIMAGE, lpszItem, nImage, nSelectedImage, 0, 0, 0, hParent, hInsertAfter);
4780  }
4781 
4782  CTreeItemT<TBase> InsertItem(LPCTSTR lpszItem, HTREEITEM hParent, HTREEITEM hInsertAfter)
4783  {
4784  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4785  return InsertItem(TVIF_TEXT, lpszItem, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, hParent, hInsertAfter);
4786  }
4787 
4788  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextItem(HTREEITEM hItem, UINT nCode) const
4789  {
4790  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4791  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, nCode, (LPARAM)hItem);
4792  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4793  }
4794 
4795  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetChildItem(HTREEITEM hItem) const
4796  {
4797  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4798  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_CHILD, (LPARAM)hItem);
4799  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4800  }
4801 
4802  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextSiblingItem(HTREEITEM hItem) const
4803  {
4804  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4805  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_NEXT, (LPARAM)hItem);
4806  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4807  }
4808 
4809  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetPrevSiblingItem(HTREEITEM hItem) const
4810  {
4811  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4812  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_PREVIOUS, (LPARAM)hItem);
4813  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4814  }
4815 
4816  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetParentItem(HTREEITEM hItem) const
4817  {
4818  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4819  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_PARENT, (LPARAM)hItem);
4820  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4821  }
4822 
4823  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetFirstVisibleItem() const
4824  {
4825  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4826  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_FIRSTVISIBLE, 0L);
4827  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4828  }
4829 
4830  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextVisibleItem(HTREEITEM hItem) const
4831  {
4832  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4833  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_NEXTVISIBLE, (LPARAM)hItem);
4834  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4835  }
4836 
4837  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetPrevVisibleItem(HTREEITEM hItem) const
4838  {
4839  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4840  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_PREVIOUSVISIBLE, (LPARAM)hItem);
4841  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4842  }
4843 
4844  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetSelectedItem() const
4845  {
4846  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4847  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_CARET, 0L);
4848  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4849  }
4850 
4851  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetDropHilightItem() const
4852  {
4853  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4854  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_DROPHILITE, 0L);
4855  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4856  }
4857 
4858  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetRootItem() const
4859  {
4860  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4861  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_ROOT, 0L);
4862  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4863  }
4864 
4865 #if !defined(_WIN32_WCE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
4866  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetLastVisibleItem() const
4867  {
4868  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4869  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_LASTVISIBLE, 0L);
4870  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4871  }
4872 #endif // !defined(_WIN32_WCE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
4873 
4874 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0600)
4875  CTreeItemT<TBase> GetNextSelectedItem() const
4876  {
4877  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4878  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_GETNEXTITEM, TVGN_NEXTSELECTED, 0L);
4879  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4880  }
4881 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0600)
4882 
4883  CTreeItemT<TBase> HitTest(TVHITTESTINFO* pHitTestInfo) const
4884  {
4885  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4886  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_HITTEST, 0, (LPARAM)pHitTestInfo);
4887  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4888  }
4889 
4890  CTreeItemT<TBase> InsertItem(UINT nMask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage,
4891  int nSelectedImage, UINT nState, UINT nStateMask, LPARAM lParam,
4892  HTREEITEM hParent, HTREEITEM hInsertAfter)
4893  {
4894  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4895  TVINSERTSTRUCT tvis = { 0 };
4896  tvis.hParent = hParent;
4897  tvis.hInsertAfter = hInsertAfter;
4898  tvis.item.mask = nMask;
4899  tvis.item.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
4900  tvis.item.iImage = nImage;
4901  tvis.item.iSelectedImage = nSelectedImage;
4902  tvis.item.state = nState;
4903  tvis.item.stateMask = nStateMask;
4904  tvis.item.lParam = lParam;
4905  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_INSERTITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&tvis);
4906  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, this);
4907  }
4908 
4909  CTreeItemT<TBase> HitTest(POINT pt, UINT* pFlags) const
4910  {
4911  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4912  TVHITTESTINFO hti = { 0 };
4913  hti.pt = pt;
4914  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_HITTEST, 0, (LPARAM)&hti);
4915  if (pFlags != NULL)
4916  *pFlags = hti.flags;
4917  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4918  }
4919 
4920 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
4921  CTreeItemT<TBase> MapAccIDToHTREEITEM(UINT uID) const
4922  {
4923  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
4924  HTREEITEM hTreeItem = (HTREEITEM)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TVM_MAPACCIDTOHTREEITEM, uID, 0L);
4925  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(hTreeItem, (CTreeViewCtrlExT<TBase>*)this);
4926  }
4927 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
4928 };
4929 
4930 typedef CTreeViewCtrlExT<ATL::CWindow> CTreeViewCtrlEx;

4934 template <class TBase>

4936 {
4937  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
4938  return m_pTreeView->GetItemRect(m_hTreeItem,lpRect,bTextOnly);
4939 }
4940

4942 inline CTreeItemT<TBase> CTreeItemT<TBase>::GetNext(UINT nCode) const
4943 {
4944  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
4945  return m_pTreeView->GetNextItem(m_hTreeItem,nCode);
4946 }

4953 }

5125 }
5126 
5127 template <class TBase>
5128 inline BOOL CTreeItemT<TBase>::Delete()
5129 {
5130  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5131  return m_pTreeView->DeleteItem(m_hTreeItem);
5132 }
5133 
5134 template <class TBase>
5135 inline BOOL CTreeItemT<TBase>::Expand(UINT nCode /*= TVE_EXPAND*/)
5136 {
5137  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5138  return m_pTreeView->Expand(m_hTreeItem,nCode);
5139 }
5140 
5141 template <class TBase>
5142 inline BOOL CTreeItemT<TBase>::Select(UINT nCode)
5143 {
5144  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5145  return m_pTreeView->Select(m_hTreeItem,nCode);
5146 }
5147

5150 {
5151  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5152  return m_pTreeView->SelectItem(m_hTreeItem);
5153 }

5160 }

5180  return m_pTreeView->CreateDragImage(m_hTreeItem);
5181 }
5182 
5183 template <class TBase>
5184 inline BOOL CTreeItemT<TBase>::SortChildren(BOOL bRecurse /*= FALSE*/)
5185 {
5186  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5187  return m_pTreeView->SortChildren(m_hTreeItem, bRecurse);
5188 }
5189 
5190 template <class TBase>
5191 inline BOOL CTreeItemT<TBase>::EnsureVisible()
5192 {
5193  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5194  return m_pTreeView->EnsureVisible(m_hTreeItem);
5195 }
5196 
5197 template <class TBase>
5198 inline CTreeItemT<TBase> CTreeItemT<TBase>::_Insert(LPCTSTR lpstrItem, int nImageIndex, HTREEITEM hItemAfter)
5199 {
5200  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5201  TVINSERTSTRUCT ins = { 0 };
5202  ins.hParent = m_hTreeItem;
5203  ins.hInsertAfter = hItemAfter;
5204  ins.item.mask = TVIF_TEXT;
5205  ins.item.pszText = (LPTSTR)lpstrItem;
5206  if(nImageIndex != -1)
5207  {
5208  ins.item.mask |= TVIF_IMAGE | TVIF_SELECTEDIMAGE;
5209  ins.item.iImage = nImageIndex;
5210  ins.item.iSelectedImage = nImageIndex;
5211  }
5212  return CTreeItemT<TBase>(m_pTreeView->InsertItem(&ins), m_pTreeView);
5213 }
5214 
5215 template <class TBase>
5216 inline int CTreeItemT<TBase>::GetImageIndex() const
5217 {
5218  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5219  TVITEM item = { 0 };
5220  item.mask = TVIF_HANDLE | TVIF_IMAGE;
5221  item.hItem = m_hTreeItem;
5222  m_pTreeView->GetItem(&item);
5223  return item.iImage;
5224 }
5225 
5226 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
5227 template <class TBase>
5228 inline BOOL CTreeItemT<TBase>::SetInsertMark(BOOL bAfter)
5229 {
5230  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5231  return m_pTreeView->SetInsertMark(m_hTreeItem, bAfter);
5232 }
5233 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
5234

5237 inline UINT CTreeItemT<TBase>::MapHTREEITEMToAccID() const
5238 {
5239  ATLASSERT(m_pTreeView != NULL);
5240  return m_pTreeView->MapHTREEITEMToAccID(m_hTreeItem);
5241 }
5242 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)

5260 
5262 // CToolBarCtrl
5263 
5264 template <class TBase>
5265 class CToolBarCtrlT : public TBase
5266 {
5267 public:
5268 // Construction
5269  CToolBarCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
5270  { }
5271 
5272  CToolBarCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
5273  {
5274  m_hWnd = hWnd;
5275  return *this;
5276  }
5277 
5278  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
5279  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
5280  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
5281  {
5282  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
5283  }
5284 
5285 // Attributes
5286  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
5287  {
5288  return TOOLBARCLASSNAME;
5289  }
5290 
5291  BOOL IsButtonEnabled(int nID) const
5292  {
5293  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5294  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_ISBUTTONENABLED, nID, 0L);
5295  }

5563 
5564  BOOL SetButtonInfo(int nID, DWORD dwMask, BYTE Style, BYTE State, LPCTSTR lpszItem,
5565  int iImage, WORD cx, int iCommand, DWORD_PTR lParam)
5566  {
5567  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5568  TBBUTTONINFO tbbi = { 0 };
5569  tbbi.cbSize = sizeof(TBBUTTONINFO);
5570  tbbi.dwMask = dwMask;
5571  tbbi.idCommand = iCommand;
5572  tbbi.iImage = iImage;
5573  tbbi.fsState = State;
5574  tbbi.fsStyle = Style;
5575  tbbi.cx = cx;
5576  tbbi.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
5577  tbbi.lParam = lParam;
5578  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_SETBUTTONINFO, nID, (LPARAM)&tbbi);
5579  }

5662  void GetPadding(LPSIZE lpSizePadding) const
5663  {
5664  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5665  ATLASSERT(lpSizePadding != NULL);
5666  DWORD dwRet = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETPADDING, 0, 0L);
5667  lpSizePadding->cx = GET_X_LPARAM(dwRet);
5668  lpSizePadding->cy = GET_Y_LPARAM(dwRet);
5669  }
5670 
5671  void SetPadding(int cx, int cy, LPSIZE lpSizePadding = NULL)
5672  {
5673  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5674  DWORD dwRet = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_SETPADDING, 0, MAKELPARAM(cx, cy));
5675  if(lpSizePadding != NULL)
5676  {
5677  lpSizePadding->cx = GET_X_LPARAM(dwRet);
5678  lpSizePadding->cy = GET_Y_LPARAM(dwRet);
5679  }
5680  }

5695 
5696 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
5697  int GetString(int nString, LPTSTR lpstrString, int cchMaxLen) const
5698  {
5699  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5700  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETSTRING, MAKEWPARAM(cchMaxLen, nString), (LPARAM)lpstrString);
5701  }
5702 
5703  int GetStringBSTR(int nString, BSTR& bstrString) const
5704  {
5705  USES_CONVERSION;
5706  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5707  ATLASSERT(bstrString == NULL);
5708  int nLength = (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETSTRING, MAKEWPARAM(0, nString), NULL));
5709  if(nLength != -1)
5710  {
5711  CTempBuffer<TCHAR, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
5712  LPTSTR lpstrText = buff.Allocate(nLength + 1);
5713  if(lpstrText != NULL)
5714  {
5715  nLength = (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETSTRING, MAKEWPARAM(nLength + 1, nString), (LPARAM)lpstrText);
5716  if(nLength != -1)
5717  bstrString = ::SysAllocString(T2OLE(lpstrText));
5718  }
5719  else
5720  {
5721  nLength = -1;
5722  }
5723  }
5724 
5725  return nLength;
5726  }
5727 
5728 #if defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
5729  int GetString(int nString, _CSTRING_NS::CString& str) const
5730  {
5731  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5732  int nLength = (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETSTRING, MAKEWPARAM(0, nString), NULL));
5733  if(nLength != -1)
5734  {
5735  LPTSTR lpstr = str.GetBufferSetLength(nLength + 1);
5736  if(lpstr != NULL)
5737  nLength = (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETSTRING, MAKEWPARAM(nLength + 1, nString), (LPARAM)lpstr);
5738  else
5739  nLength = -1;
5740  str.ReleaseBuffer();
5741  }
5742  return nLength;
5743  }
5744 #endif // defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
5745 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
5746 
5747 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
5748  void GetMetrics(LPTBMETRICS lptbm) const
5749  {
5750  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5751  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_GETMETRICS, 0, (LPARAM)lptbm);
5752  }
5753 
5754  void SetMetrics(LPTBMETRICS lptbm)
5755  {
5756  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5757  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_SETMETRICS, 0, (LPARAM)lptbm);
5758  }
5759

5761  {
5762  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5763  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_SETWINDOWTHEME, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrTheme);
5764  }
5765 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501)
5766

5772  }

5778  }
5779 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)

5827  tbab.nID = (UINT_PTR)hBitmap;

5843  BOOL InsertButton(int nIndex, int iCommand, BYTE Style, BYTE State, int iBitmap,
5844  INT_PTR iString, DWORD_PTR lParam)
5845  {
5846  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
5847  TBBUTTON tbb = { 0 };
5848  tbb.fsStyle = Style;
5849  tbb.fsState = State;
5850  tbb.idCommand = iCommand;
5851  tbb.iBitmap = iBitmap;
5852  tbb.iString = iString;
5853  tbb.dwData = lParam;
5854  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TB_INSERTBUTTON, nIndex, (LPARAM)&tbb);
5855  }
5856

5858  LPCTSTR lpszItem, DWORD_PTR lParam)
5859  {
5860  return InsertButton(nIndex, iCommand, Style, State, iBitmap, (INT_PTR)lpszItem, lParam);
5861  }

5864  {

5866  }

5869  {

6010 
6012 // CStatusBarCtrl
6013 
6014 template <class TBase>
6015 class CStatusBarCtrlT : public TBase
6016 {
6017 public:
6018 // Constructors
6019  CStatusBarCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
6020  { }
6021 
6022  CStatusBarCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
6023  {
6024  m_hWnd = hWnd;
6025  return *this;
6026  }
6027 
6028  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
6029  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
6030  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
6031  {
6032  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
6033  }
6034 
6035 // Methods
6036  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
6037  {
6038  return STATUSCLASSNAME;
6039  }
6040 
6041  int GetParts(int nParts, int* pParts) const
6042  {
6043  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6044  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETPARTS, nParts, (LPARAM)pParts);
6045  }
6046 
6047  BOOL SetParts(int nParts, int* pWidths)
6048  {
6049  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6050  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETPARTS, nParts, (LPARAM)pWidths);
6051  }
6052 
6053  int GetTextLength(int nPane, int* pType = NULL) const
6054  {
6055  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6056  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6057  DWORD dwRet = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETTEXTLENGTH, (WPARAM)nPane, 0L);
6058  if (pType != NULL)
6059  *pType = (int)(short)HIWORD(dwRet);
6060  return (int)(short)LOWORD(dwRet);
6061  }
6062 
6063  int GetText(int nPane, LPTSTR lpszText, int* pType = NULL) const
6064  {
6065  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6066  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6067  DWORD dwRet = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETTEXT, (WPARAM)nPane, (LPARAM)lpszText);
6068  if(pType != NULL)
6069  *pType = (int)(short)HIWORD(dwRet);
6070  return (int)(short)LOWORD(dwRet);
6071  }
6072 
6073 #ifndef _ATL_NO_COM
6074  BOOL GetTextBSTR(int nPane, BSTR& bstrText, int* pType = NULL) const
6075  {
6076  USES_CONVERSION;
6077  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6078  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6079  ATLASSERT(bstrText == NULL);
6080  int nLength = (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETTEXTLENGTH, (WPARAM)nPane, 0L));
6081  if(nLength == 0)
6082  return FALSE;
6083 
6084  CTempBuffer<TCHAR, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
6085  LPTSTR lpstrText = buff.Allocate(nLength + 1);
6086  if(lpstrText == NULL)
6087  return FALSE;
6088 
6089  if(!GetText(nPane, lpstrText, pType))
6090  return FALSE;
6091 
6092  bstrText = ::SysAllocString(T2OLE(lpstrText));
6093  return (bstrText != NULL) ? TRUE : FALSE;
6094  }
6095 #endif // !_ATL_NO_COM
6096 
6097 #if defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
6098  int GetText(int nPane, _CSTRING_NS::CString& strText, int* pType = NULL) const
6099  {
6100  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6101  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6102  int nLength = (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETTEXTLENGTH, (WPARAM)nPane, 0L));
6103  if(nLength == 0)
6104  return 0;
6105 
6106  LPTSTR lpstr = strText.GetBufferSetLength(nLength);
6107  if(lpstr == NULL)
6108  return 0;
6109  return GetText(nPane, lpstr, pType);
6110  }
6111 #endif // defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
6112 
6113  BOOL SetText(int nPane, LPCTSTR lpszText, int nType = 0)
6114  {
6115  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6116  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6117  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETTEXT, (nPane | nType), (LPARAM)lpszText);
6118  }
6119 
6120  BOOL GetRect(int nPane, LPRECT lpRect) const
6121  {
6122  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6123  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6124  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETRECT, nPane, (LPARAM)lpRect);
6125  }
6126 
6127  BOOL GetBorders(int* pBorders) const
6128  {
6129  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6130  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETBORDERS, 0, (LPARAM)pBorders);
6131  }
6132 
6133  BOOL GetBorders(int& nHorz, int& nVert, int& nSpacing) const
6134  {
6135  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6136  int borders[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
6137  BOOL bResult = (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETBORDERS, 0, (LPARAM)&borders);
6138  if(bResult)
6139  {
6140  nHorz = borders[0];
6141  nVert = borders[1];
6142  nSpacing = borders[2];
6143  }
6144  return bResult;
6145  }
6146 
6147  void SetMinHeight(int nMin)
6148  {
6149  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6150  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETMINHEIGHT, nMin, 0L);
6151  }
6152

6154  {
6155  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6156  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SIMPLE, bSimple, 0L);
6157  }
6158

6160  {
6161  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6162  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_ISSIMPLE, 0, 0L);
6163  }
6164 
6165 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)

6167  {
6168  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6169  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETUNICODEFORMAT, 0, 0L);
6170  }
6171

6173  {
6174  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6175  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETUNICODEFORMAT, bUnicode, 0L);
6176  }
6177 
6178  void GetTipText(int nPane, LPTSTR lpstrText, int nSize) const
6179  {
6180  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6181  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6182  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETTIPTEXT, MAKEWPARAM(nPane, nSize), (LPARAM)lpstrText);
6183  }
6184 
6185  void SetTipText(int nPane, LPCTSTR lpstrText)
6186  {
6187  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6188  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6189  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETTIPTEXT, nPane, (LPARAM)lpstrText);
6190  }
6191 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
6192 
6193 #if ((_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)) || (defined(_WIN32_WCE) && (_WIN32_WCE >= 0x0500))
6194  COLORREF SetBkColor(COLORREF clrBk)
6195  {
6196  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6197  return (COLORREF)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETBKCOLOR, 0, (LPARAM)clrBk);
6198  }
6199 
6200  HICON GetIcon(int nPane) const
6201  {
6202  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6203  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6204  return (HICON)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_GETICON, nPane, 0L);
6205  }
6206 
6207  BOOL SetIcon(int nPane, HICON hIcon)
6208  {
6209  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6210  ATLASSERT(nPane < 256);
6211  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, SB_SETICON, nPane, (LPARAM)hIcon);
6212  }
6213 #endif // ((_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)) || (defined(_WIN32_WCE) && (_WIN32_WCE >= 0x0500))
6214 };
6215 
6216 typedef CStatusBarCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CStatusBarCtrl;
6217 
6218 
6220 // CTabCtrl
6221 
6222 template <class TBase>
6223 class CTabCtrlT : public TBase
6224 {
6225 public:
6226 // Constructors
6227  CTabCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
6228  { }
6229 
6230  CTabCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
6231  {
6232  m_hWnd = hWnd;
6233  return *this;
6234  }
6235 
6236  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
6237  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
6238  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
6239  {
6240  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
6241  }
6242 
6243 // Attributes
6244  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
6245  {
6246  return WC_TABCONTROL;
6247  }
6248 
6249  CImageList GetImageList() const
6250  {
6251  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6252  return CImageList((HIMAGELIST)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_GETIMAGELIST, 0, 0L));
6253  }
6254 
6255  CImageList SetImageList(HIMAGELIST hImageList)
6256  {
6257  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6258  return CImageList((HIMAGELIST)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_SETIMAGELIST, 0, (LPARAM)hImageList));
6259  }
6260 
6261  int GetItemCount() const
6262  {
6263  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6264  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_GETITEMCOUNT, 0, 0L);
6265  }
6266 
6267  BOOL GetItem(int nItem, LPTCITEM pTabCtrlItem) const
6268  {
6269  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6270  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_GETITEM, nItem, (LPARAM)pTabCtrlItem);
6271  }
6272 
6273  BOOL SetItem(int nItem, LPTCITEM pTabCtrlItem)
6274  {
6275  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6276  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_SETITEM, nItem, (LPARAM)pTabCtrlItem);
6277  }
6278 
6279  int SetItem(int nItem, UINT mask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, DWORD dwState, DWORD dwStateMask, int iImage, LPARAM lParam)
6280  {
6281  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6282  TCITEM tci = { 0 };
6283  tci.mask = mask;
6284  tci.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
6285  tci.dwState = dwState;
6286  tci.dwStateMask = dwStateMask;
6287  tci.iImage = iImage;
6288  tci.lParam = lParam;
6289  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_SETITEM, nItem, (LPARAM)&tci);
6290  }
6291 
6292  BOOL GetItemRect(int nItem, LPRECT lpRect) const
6293  {
6294  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6295  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_GETITEMRECT, nItem, (LPARAM)lpRect);
6296  }
6297

6299  {
6300  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6301  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_GETCURSEL, 0, 0L);
6302  }

6307  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_SETCURSEL, nItem, 0L);
6308  }
6309 
6310  SIZE SetItemSize(SIZE size)
6311  {
6312  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6313  DWORD dwSize = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_SETITEMSIZE, 0, MAKELPARAM(size.cx, size.cy));
6314  SIZE sizeRet = { GET_X_LPARAM(dwSize), GET_Y_LPARAM(dwSize) };
6315  return sizeRet;
6316  }
6317

6319  {
6320  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6321  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_SETITEMSIZE, 0, MAKELPARAM(cx, cy));
6322  }

6403 // Operations
6404  int InsertItem(int nItem, LPTCITEM pTabCtrlItem)
6405  {
6406  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6407  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_INSERTITEM, nItem, (LPARAM)pTabCtrlItem);
6408  }
6409 
6410  int InsertItem(int nItem, UINT mask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int iImage, LPARAM lParam)
6411  {
6412  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6413  TCITEM tci = { 0 };
6414  tci.mask = mask;
6415  tci.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
6416  tci.iImage = iImage;
6417  tci.lParam = lParam;
6418  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_INSERTITEM, nItem, (LPARAM)&tci);
6419  }
6420 
6421  int InsertItem(int nItem, LPCTSTR lpszItem)
6422  {
6423  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6424  TCITEM tci = { 0 };
6425  tci.mask = TCIF_TEXT;
6426  tci.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
6427  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_INSERTITEM, nItem, (LPARAM)&tci);
6428  }
6429 
6430  int AddItem(LPTCITEM pTabCtrlItem)
6431  {
6432  return InsertItem(GetItemCount(), pTabCtrlItem);
6433  }
6434 
6435  int AddItem(UINT mask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int iImage, LPARAM lParam)
6436  {
6437  return InsertItem(GetItemCount(), mask, lpszItem, iImage, lParam);
6438  }
6439 
6440  int AddItem(LPCTSTR lpszItem)
6441  {
6442  return InsertItem(GetItemCount(), lpszItem);
6443  }
6444 
6445  BOOL DeleteItem(int nItem)
6446  {
6447  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6448  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_DELETEITEM, nItem, 0L);
6449  }
6450 
6451  BOOL DeleteAllItems()
6452  {
6453  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6454  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_DELETEALLITEMS, 0, 0L);
6455  }
6456 
6457  void AdjustRect(BOOL bLarger, LPRECT lpRect)
6458  {
6459  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6460  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_ADJUSTRECT, bLarger, (LPARAM)lpRect);
6461  }
6462 
6463  void RemoveImage(int nImage)
6464  {
6465  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6466  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_REMOVEIMAGE, nImage, 0L);
6467  }
6468 
6469  int HitTest(TC_HITTESTINFO* pHitTestInfo) const
6470  {
6471  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6472  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_HITTEST, 0, (LPARAM)pHitTestInfo);
6473  }
6474 
6475  void DeselectAll(BOOL bExcludeFocus = TRUE)
6476  {
6477  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6478  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_DESELECTALL, bExcludeFocus, 0L);
6479  }
6480 
6481 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
6482  BOOL HighlightItem(int nIndex, BOOL bHighlight = TRUE)
6483  {
6484  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6485  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, TCM_HIGHLIGHTITEM, nIndex, MAKELPARAM(bHighlight, 0));
6486  }
6487 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
6488 };

6502  { }

6505  {
6506  m_hWnd = hWnd;
6507  return *this;
6508  }
6509 
6510  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
6511  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
6512  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
6513  {
6514  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
6515  }

6770 template <class TBase>
6771 class CUpDownCtrlT : public TBase
6772 {
6773 public:
6774 // Constructors
6775  CUpDownCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
6776  { }
6777 
6778  CUpDownCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
6779  {
6780  m_hWnd = hWnd;
6781  return *this;
6782  }
6783 
6784  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
6785  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
6786  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
6787  {
6788  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
6789  }
6790 
6791 // Attributes
6792  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
6793  {
6794  return UPDOWN_CLASS;
6795  }
6796 
6797  UINT GetAccel(int nAccel, UDACCEL* pAccel) const
6798  {
6799  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6800  return (UINT)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETACCEL, nAccel, (LPARAM)pAccel));
6801  }
6802

6807  }

6810  {

6813  }

6816  {

6819  }
6820 
6821  ATL::CWindow GetBuddy() const
6822  {
6823  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6824  return ATL::CWindow((HWND)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETBUDDY, 0, 0L));
6825  }
6826 
6827  ATL::CWindow SetBuddy(HWND hWndBuddy)
6828  {
6829  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6830  return ATL::CWindow((HWND)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_SETBUDDY, (WPARAM)hWndBuddy, 0L));
6831  }
6832 
6833  int GetPos(LPBOOL lpbError = NULL) const
6834  {
6835  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6836  DWORD dwRet = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETPOS, 0, 0L);
6837  // Note: Seems that Windows always sets error to TRUE if
6838  // UDS_SETBUDDYINT style is not used
6839  if(lpbError != NULL)
6840  *lpbError = (HIWORD(dwRet) != 0) ? TRUE : FALSE;
6841  return (int)(short)LOWORD(dwRet);
6842  }
6843 
6844  int SetPos(int nPos)
6845  {
6846  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6847  return (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_SETPOS, 0, MAKELPARAM(nPos, 0)));
6848  }
6849 
6850  DWORD GetRange() const
6851  {
6852  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6853  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETRANGE, 0, 0L);
6854  }
6855 
6856  void GetRange(int& nLower, int& nUpper) const
6857  {
6858  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6859  DWORD dwRet = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETRANGE, 0, 0L);
6860  nLower = (int)(short)HIWORD(dwRet);
6861  nUpper = (int)(short)LOWORD(dwRet);
6862  }
6863 
6864  void SetRange(int nLower, int nUpper)
6865  {
6866  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6867  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_SETRANGE, 0, MAKELPARAM(nUpper, nLower));
6868  }
6869 
6870 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
6871  void SetRange32(int nLower, int nUpper)
6872  {
6873  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6874  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_SETRANGE32, nLower, nUpper);
6875  }
6876 
6877  void GetRange32(int& nLower, int& nUpper) const
6878  {
6879  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6880  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETRANGE32, (WPARAM)&nLower, (LPARAM)&nUpper);
6881  }
6882 
6883 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
6884  BOOL GetUnicodeFormat() const
6885  {
6886  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6887  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETUNICODEFORMAT, 0, 0L);
6888  }
6889 
6890  BOOL SetUnicodeFormat(BOOL bUnicode = TRUE)
6891  {
6892  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6893  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_SETUNICODEFORMAT, bUnicode, 0L);
6894  }
6895 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
6896 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
6897 
6898 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
6899  int GetPos32(LPBOOL lpbError = NULL) const
6900  {
6901  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6902  // Note: Seems that Windows always sets error to TRUE if
6903  // UDS_SETBUDDYINT style is not used
6904  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_GETPOS32, 0, (LPARAM)lpbError);
6905  }
6906 
6907  int SetPos32(int nPos)
6908  {
6909  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6910  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, UDM_SETPOS32, 0, (LPARAM)nPos);
6911  }
6912 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
6913 };
6914 
6915 typedef CUpDownCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CUpDownCtrl;

6919 // CProgressBarCtrl
6920 
6921 template <class TBase>
6922 class CProgressBarCtrlT : public TBase
6923 {
6924 public:
6925 // Constructors
6926  CProgressBarCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
6927  { }
6928 
6929  CProgressBarCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
6930  {
6931  m_hWnd = hWnd;
6932  return *this;
6933  }
6934 
6935  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
6936  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
6937  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
6938  {
6939  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
6940  }
6941 
6942 // Attributes
6943  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
6944  {
6945  return PROGRESS_CLASS;
6946  }
6947 
6948  DWORD SetRange(int nLower, int nUpper)
6949  {
6950  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6951  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_SETRANGE, 0, MAKELPARAM(nLower, nUpper));
6952  }
6953 
6954  int SetPos(int nPos)
6955  {
6956  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6957  return (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_SETPOS, nPos, 0L));
6958  }
6959 
6960  int OffsetPos(int nPos)
6961  {
6962  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6963  return (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_DELTAPOS, nPos, 0L));
6964  }
6965 
6966  int SetStep(int nStep)
6967  {
6968  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6969  return (int)(short)LOWORD(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_SETSTEP, nStep, 0L));
6970  }
6971 
6972  UINT GetPos() const
6973  {
6974  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6975  return (UINT)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_GETPOS, 0, 0L);
6976  }
6977 
6978  void GetRange(PPBRANGE pPBRange) const
6979  {
6980  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6981  ATLASSERT(pPBRange != NULL);
6982  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_GETRANGE, TRUE, (LPARAM)pPBRange);
6983  }
6984 
6985  void GetRange(int& nLower, int& nUpper) const
6986  {
6987  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6988  PBRANGE range = { 0 };
6989  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_GETRANGE, TRUE, (LPARAM)&range);
6990  nLower = range.iLow;
6991  nUpper = range.iHigh;
6992  }
6993 
6994  int GetRangeLimit(BOOL bLowLimit) const
6995  {
6996  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
6997  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_GETRANGE, bLowLimit, (LPARAM)NULL);
6998  }
6999 
7000  DWORD SetRange32(int nMin, int nMax)
7001  {
7002  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7003  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_SETRANGE32, nMin, nMax);
7004  }
7005 
7006 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)

7008  {

7010  return (COLORREF)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, PBM_SETBARCOLOR, 0, (LPARAM)clr);

7072 // CHotKeyCtrl
7073 
7074 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
7075 
7076 template <class TBase>
7077 class CHotKeyCtrlT : public TBase
7078 {
7079 public:
7080 // Constructors
7081  CHotKeyCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
7082  { }
7083 
7084  CHotKeyCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
7085  {
7086  m_hWnd = hWnd;
7087  return *this;
7088  }
7089 
7090  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
7091  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
7092  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
7093  {
7094  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
7095  }
7096 
7097 // Attributes
7098  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
7099  {
7100  return HOTKEY_CLASS;
7101  }
7102 
7103  DWORD GetHotKey() const
7104  {
7105  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7106  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, HKM_GETHOTKEY, 0, 0L);
7107  }
7108 
7109  void GetHotKey(WORD &wVirtualKeyCode, WORD &wModifiers) const
7110  {
7111  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7112  DWORD dw = (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, HKM_GETHOTKEY, 0, 0L);
7113  wVirtualKeyCode = LOBYTE(LOWORD(dw));
7114  wModifiers = HIBYTE(LOWORD(dw));
7115  }
7116 
7117  void SetHotKey(WORD wVirtualKeyCode, WORD wModifiers)
7118  {
7119  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7120  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, HKM_SETHOTKEY, MAKEWORD(wVirtualKeyCode, wModifiers), 0L);
7121  }
7122 
7123  void SetRules(WORD wInvalidComb, WORD wModifiers)
7124  {
7125  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7126  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, HKM_SETRULES, wInvalidComb, MAKELPARAM(wModifiers, 0));
7127  }
7128 };
7129 
7130 typedef CHotKeyCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CHotKeyCtrl;
7131 
7132 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE

7136 // CAnimateCtrl
7137 
7138 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
7139 
7140 template <class TBase>
7141 class CAnimateCtrlT : public TBase
7142 {
7143 public:
7144 // Constructors
7145  CAnimateCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
7146  { }
7147 
7148  CAnimateCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
7149  {
7150  m_hWnd = hWnd;
7151  return *this;
7152  }
7153 
7154  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
7155  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
7156  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
7157  {
7158  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
7159  }
7160 
7161 // Attributes
7162  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
7163  {
7164  return ANIMATE_CLASS;
7165  }
7166 
7167 // Operations
7168  BOOL Open(ATL::_U_STRINGorID FileName)
7169  {
7170  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7171  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, ACM_OPEN, 0, (LPARAM)FileName.m_lpstr);
7172  }
7173 
7174  BOOL Play(UINT nFrom, UINT nTo, UINT nRep)
7175  {
7176  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7177  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, ACM_PLAY, nRep, MAKELPARAM(nFrom, nTo));
7178  }
7179 
7180  BOOL Stop()
7181  {
7182  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7183  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, ACM_STOP, 0, 0L);
7184  }
7185 
7186  BOOL Close()
7187  {
7188  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7189  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, ACM_OPEN, 0, 0L);
7190  }
7191 
7192  BOOL Seek(UINT nTo)
7193  {
7194  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7195  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, ACM_PLAY, 0, MAKELPARAM(nTo, nTo));
7196  }
7197 
7198  // Vista only
7199  BOOL IsPlaying() const
7200  {
7201 #ifndef ACM_ISPLAYING
7202  const UINT ACM_ISPLAYING = (WM_USER+104);
7203 #endif
7204  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7205  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, ACM_ISPLAYING, 0, 0L);
7206  }
7207 };
7208 
7209 typedef CAnimateCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CAnimateCtrl;

7211 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE

7215 // CRichEditCtrl
7216 
7217 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
7218 
7219 #ifdef _UNICODE
7220 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER == 0x0100)
7221 #undef RICHEDIT_CLASS
7222 #define RICHEDIT_CLASS L"RICHEDIT"
7223 #endif // (_RICHEDIT_VER == 0x0100)
7224 #endif // _UNICODE
7225 
7226 template <class TBase>
7227 class CRichEditCtrlT : public TBase
7228 {
7229 public:
7230 // Constructors
7231  CRichEditCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
7232  { }
7233 
7234  CRichEditCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
7235  {
7236  m_hWnd = hWnd;
7237  return *this;
7238  }
7239 
7240  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
7241  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
7242  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
7243  {
7244  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
7245  }
7246 
7247 // Attributes
7248  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
7249  {
7250  return RICHEDIT_CLASS;
7251  }
7252 
7253  static LPCTSTR GetLibraryName()
7254  {
7255 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7256  return _T("RICHED20.DLL");
7257 #else
7258  return _T("RICHED32.DLL");
7259 #endif
7260  }
7261 
7262  int GetLineCount() const
7263  {
7264  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7265  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETLINECOUNT, 0, 0L);
7266  }
7267

7269  {
7270  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7271  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETMODIFY, 0, 0L);
7272  }

7275  {

7277  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SETMODIFY, bModified, 0L);
7278  }

7281  {
7282  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7283  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETRECT, 0, (LPARAM)lpRect);
7284  }

7287  {

7295  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SETOPTIONS, wOperation, dwOptions);
7296  }
7297 
7298  // NOTE: first word in lpszBuffer must contain the size of the buffer!
7299  int GetLine(int nIndex, LPTSTR lpszBuffer) const
7300  {
7301  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7302  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETLINE, nIndex, (LPARAM)lpszBuffer);
7303  }
7304 
7305  int GetLine(int nIndex, LPTSTR lpszBuffer, int nMaxLength) const
7306  {
7307  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7308  *(LPWORD)lpszBuffer = (WORD)nMaxLength;
7309  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETLINE, nIndex, (LPARAM)lpszBuffer);
7310  }
7311 
7312  BOOL CanUndo() const
7313  {
7314  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7315  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_CANUNDO, 0, 0L);
7316  }
7317

7319  {
7320  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7321  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_CANPASTE, nFormat, 0L);
7322  }
7323 
7324  void GetSel(LONG& nStartChar, LONG& nEndChar) const
7325  {
7326  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7327  CHARRANGE cr = { 0, 0 };
7328  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_EXGETSEL, 0, (LPARAM)&cr);
7329  nStartChar = cr.cpMin;
7330  nEndChar = cr.cpMax;
7331  }
7332 
7333  void GetSel(CHARRANGE &cr) const
7334  {
7335  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7336  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_EXGETSEL, 0, (LPARAM)&cr);
7337  }
7338 
7339  int SetSel(LONG nStartChar, LONG nEndChar)
7340  {
7341  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7342  CHARRANGE cr = { nStartChar, nEndChar };
7343  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_EXSETSEL, 0, (LPARAM)&cr);
7344  }
7345 
7346  int SetSel(CHARRANGE &cr)
7347  {
7348  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7349  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_EXSETSEL, 0, (LPARAM)&cr);
7350  }
7351 
7352  int SetSelAll()
7353  {
7354  return SetSel(0, -1);
7355  }
7356 
7357  int SetSelNone()
7358  {
7359  return SetSel(-1, 0);
7360  }
7361

7363  {
7364  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7365  cf.cbSize = sizeof(CHARFORMAT);
7366  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETCHARFORMAT, 0, (LPARAM)&cf);
7367  }
7368

7373  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETCHARFORMAT, 1, (LPARAM)&cf);
7374  }

7377  {
7378  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7379  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETEVENTMASK, 0, 0L);
7380  }

7393  }
7394 
7395 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7396  LONG GetSelText(LPTSTR lpstrBuff) const
7397  {
7398  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7399  return (LONG)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETSELTEXT, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrBuff);
7400  }
7401 #else // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7402  // RichEdit 1.0 EM_GETSELTEXT is ANSI only
7403  LONG GetSelText(LPSTR lpstrBuff) const
7404  {
7405  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7406  return (LONG)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETSELTEXT, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrBuff);
7407  }
7408 #endif // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7409 
7410 #ifndef _ATL_NO_COM
7411  BOOL GetSelTextBSTR(BSTR& bstrText) const
7412  {
7413  USES_CONVERSION;
7414  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7415  ATLASSERT(bstrText == NULL);
7416 
7417  CHARRANGE cr = { 0, 0 };
7418  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_EXGETSEL, 0, (LPARAM)&cr);
7419 
7420 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7421  CTempBuffer<TCHAR, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
7422  LPTSTR lpstrText = buff.Allocate(cr.cpMax - cr.cpMin + 1);
7423  if(lpstrText == NULL)
7424  return FALSE;
7425  if(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETSELTEXT, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrText) == 0)
7426  return FALSE;
7427 
7428  bstrText = ::SysAllocString(T2W(lpstrText));
7429 #else // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7430  CTempBuffer<char, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
7431  LPSTR lpstrText = buff.Allocate(cr.cpMax - cr.cpMin + 1);
7432  if(lpstrText == NULL)
7433  return FALSE;
7434  if(::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETSELTEXT, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrText) == 0)
7435  return FALSE;
7436 
7437  bstrText = ::SysAllocString(A2W(lpstrText));
7438 #endif // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7439 
7440  return (bstrText != NULL) ? TRUE : FALSE;
7441  }
7442 #endif // !_ATL_NO_COM
7443 
7444 #if defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
7445  LONG GetSelText(_CSTRING_NS::CString& strText) const
7446  {
7447  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7448 
7449  CHARRANGE cr = { 0, 0 };
7450  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_EXGETSEL, 0, (LPARAM)&cr);
7451 
7452 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7453  LONG lLen = 0;
7454  LPTSTR lpstrText = strText.GetBufferSetLength(cr.cpMax - cr.cpMin);
7455  if(lpstrText != NULL)
7456  {
7457  lLen = (LONG)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETSELTEXT, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrText);
7458  strText.ReleaseBuffer();
7459  }
7460 #else // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7461  CTempBuffer<char, _WTL_STACK_ALLOC_THRESHOLD> buff;
7462  LPSTR lpstrText = buff.Allocate(cr.cpMax - cr.cpMin + 1);
7463  if(lpstrText == NULL)
7464  return 0;
7465  LONG lLen = (LONG)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETSELTEXT, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrText);
7466  if(lLen == 0)
7467  return 0;
7468 
7469  USES_CONVERSION;
7470  strText = A2T(lpstrText);
7471 #endif // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
7472 
7473  return lLen;
7474  }
7475 #endif // defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
7476

7479  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7480  return (WORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SELECTIONTYPE, 0, 0L);
7481  }

7586  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETTEXTRANGE, 0, (LPARAM)&tr);
7587  }
7588 #else // !(_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)

7720 
7721  int GetTextEx(LPTSTR lpstrText, int nTextLen, DWORD dwFlags = GT_DEFAULT, UINT uCodePage = CP_ACP, LPCSTR lpDefaultChar = NULL, LPBOOL lpUsedDefChar = NULL) const
7722  {
7723  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7724  GETTEXTEX gte = { 0 };
7725  gte.cb = nTextLen * sizeof(TCHAR);
7726  gte.codepage = uCodePage;
7727  gte.flags = dwFlags;
7728  gte.lpDefaultChar = lpDefaultChar;
7729  gte.lpUsedDefChar = lpUsedDefChar;
7730  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETTEXTEX, (WPARAM)&gte, (LPARAM)lpstrText);
7731  }

7744  gtle.flags = dwFlags;
7745  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETTEXTLENGTHEX, (WPARAM)&gtle, 0L);
7746  }

7959 
7960  // Additional operations
7961  void ScrollCaret()
7962  {
7963  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7964  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SCROLLCARET, 0, 0L);
7965  }
7966 
7967  int InsertText(long nInsertAfterChar, LPCTSTR lpstrText, BOOL bCanUndo = FALSE)
7968  {
7969  int nRet = SetSel(nInsertAfterChar, nInsertAfterChar);
7970  ReplaceSel(lpstrText, bCanUndo);
7971  return nRet;
7972  }
7973 
7974  int AppendText(LPCTSTR lpstrText, BOOL bCanUndo = FALSE)
7975  {
7976  return InsertText(GetWindowTextLength(), lpstrText, bCanUndo);
7977  }
7978 
7979  // Clipboard operations
7980  BOOL Undo()
7981  {
7982  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7983  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_UNDO, 0, 0L);
7984  }
7985 
7986  void Clear()
7987  {
7988  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7989  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, WM_CLEAR, 0, 0L);
7990  }
7991 
7992  void Copy()
7993  {
7994  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
7995  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, WM_COPY, 0, 0L);
7996  }
7997 
7998  void Cut()
7999  {
8000  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8001  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, WM_CUT, 0, 0L);
8002  }
8003 
8004  void Paste()
8005  {
8006  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8007  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, WM_PASTE, 0, 0L);
8008  }
8009 
8010  // OLE support
8011  IRichEditOle* GetOleInterface() const
8012  {
8013  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8014  IRichEditOle *pRichEditOle = NULL;
8015  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_GETOLEINTERFACE, 0, (LPARAM)&pRichEditOle);
8016  return pRichEditOle;
8017  }
8018 
8019  BOOL SetOleCallback(IRichEditOleCallback* pCallback)
8020  {
8021  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8022  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SETOLECALLBACK, 0, (LPARAM)pCallback);
8023  }
8024 
8025 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
8026  BOOL Redo()
8027  {
8028  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8029  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_REDO, 0, 0L);
8030  }
8031 
8032  void StopGroupTyping()
8033  {
8034  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8035  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_STOPGROUPTYPING, 0, 0L);
8036  }
8037 
8038  void ShowScrollBar(int nBarType, BOOL bVisible = TRUE)
8039  {
8040  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8041  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SHOWSCROLLBAR, nBarType, bVisible);
8042  }
8043 #endif // (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
8044 
8045 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0300)
8046  BOOL SetTabStops(int nTabStops, LPINT rgTabStops)
8047  {
8048  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8049  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SETTABSTOPS, nTabStops, (LPARAM)rgTabStops);
8050  }
8051 
8052  BOOL SetTabStops()
8053  {
8054  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8055  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SETTABSTOPS, 0, 0L);
8056  }
8057 
8058  BOOL SetTabStops(const int& cxEachStop) // takes an 'int'
8059  {
8060  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8061  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, EM_SETTABSTOPS, 1, (LPARAM)(LPINT)&cxEachStop);
8062  }
8063 #endif // (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0300)
8064 };
8065 
8066 typedef CRichEditCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CRichEditCtrl;
8067 
8068 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
8069 
8070 
8072 // CRichEditCommands - message handlers for standard EDIT commands
8073 
8074 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
8075 
8076 // Chain to CRichEditCommands message map. Your class must also derive from CRichEditCtrl.
8077 // Example:
8078 // class CMyRichEdit : public CWindowImpl<CMyRichEdit, CRichEditCtrl>,
8079 // public CRichEditCommands<CMyRichEdit>
8080 // {
8081 // public:
8082 // BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CMyRichEdit)
8083 // // your handlers...
8084 // CHAIN_MSG_MAP_ALT(CRichEditCommands<CMyRichEdit>, 1)
8085 // END_MSG_MAP()
8086 // // other stuff...
8087 // };
8088 
8089 template <class T>
8090 class CRichEditCommands : public CEditCommands< T >
8091 {
8092 public:
8093  BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CRichEditCommands< T >)
8094  ALT_MSG_MAP(1)
8095  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_CLEAR, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditClear)
8096  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_CLEAR_ALL, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditClearAll)
8097  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_COPY, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditCopy)
8098  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_CUT, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditCut)
8099  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_PASTE, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditPaste)
8100  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_SELECT_ALL, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditSelectAll)
8101  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_UNDO, CEditCommands< T >::OnEditUndo)
8102 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
8103  COMMAND_ID_HANDLER(ID_EDIT_REDO, OnEditRedo)
8104 #endif // (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
8105  END_MSG_MAP()
8106 
8107 #if (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
8108  LRESULT OnEditRedo(WORD /*wNotifyCode*/, WORD /*wID*/, HWND /*hWndCtl*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
8109  {
8110  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
8111  pT->Redo();
8112  return 0;
8113  }
8114 #endif // (_RICHEDIT_VER >= 0x0200)
8115 
8116 // State (update UI) helpers
8117  BOOL CanCut() const
8118  { return HasSelection(); }
8119 
8120  BOOL CanCopy() const
8121  { return HasSelection(); }
8122 
8123  BOOL CanClear() const
8124  { return HasSelection(); }
8125 
8126 // Implementation
8127  BOOL HasSelection() const
8128  {
8129  const T* pT = static_cast<const T*>(this);
8130  return (pT->GetSelectionType() != SEL_EMPTY);
8131  }
8132 };
8133 
8134 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
8135 
8136 
8138 // CDragListBox
8139 
8140 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
8141 
8142 template <class TBase>
8143 class CDragListBoxT : public CListBoxT< TBase >
8144 {
8145 public:
8146 // Constructors
8147  CDragListBoxT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : CListBoxT< TBase >(hWnd)
8148  { }
8149 
8150  CDragListBoxT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
8151  {
8152  m_hWnd = hWnd;
8153  return *this;
8154  }
8155 
8156  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
8157  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
8158  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
8159  {
8160  HWND hWnd = TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
8161  if(hWnd != NULL)
8162  MakeDragList();
8163  return hWnd;
8164  }
8165 
8166 // Operations
8167  BOOL MakeDragList()
8168  {
8169  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8170  ATLASSERT((GetStyle() & (LBS_MULTIPLESEL | LBS_EXTENDEDSEL)) == 0);
8171  return ::MakeDragList(m_hWnd);
8172  }
8173 
8174  int LBItemFromPt(POINT pt, BOOL bAutoScroll = TRUE)
8175  {
8176  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8177  return ::LBItemFromPt(m_hWnd, pt, bAutoScroll);
8178  }
8179 
8180  void DrawInsert(int nItem)
8181  {
8182  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8183  ::DrawInsert(GetParent(), m_hWnd, nItem);
8184  }
8185 
8186  static UINT GetDragListMessage()
8187  {
8188  static UINT uDragListMessage = 0;
8189  if(uDragListMessage == 0)
8190  {
8191  CStaticDataInitCriticalSectionLock lock;
8192  if(FAILED(lock.Lock()))
8193  {
8194  ATLTRACE2(atlTraceUI, 0, _T("ERROR : Unable to lock critical section in CDragListBox::GetDragListMessage.\n"));
8195  ATLASSERT(FALSE);
8196  return 0;
8197  }
8198 
8199  if(uDragListMessage == 0)
8200  uDragListMessage = ::RegisterWindowMessage(DRAGLISTMSGSTRING);
8201 
8202  lock.Unlock();
8203  }
8204  ATLASSERT(uDragListMessage != 0);
8205  return uDragListMessage;
8206  }
8207 };
8208 
8209 typedef CDragListBoxT<ATL::CWindow> CDragListBox;
8210 
8211 template <class T>
8212 class CDragListNotifyImpl
8213 {
8214 public:
8215  BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CDragListNotifyImpl< T >)
8216  MESSAGE_HANDLER(CDragListBox::GetDragListMessage(), OnDragListNotify)
8217  END_MSG_MAP()
8218 
8219  LRESULT OnDragListNotify(UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam, BOOL& bHandled)
8220  {
8221  uMsg; // avoid level 4 warning
8222  ATLASSERT(uMsg == CDragListBox::GetDragListMessage());
8223  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
8224  LPDRAGLISTINFO lpDragListInfo = (LPDRAGLISTINFO)lParam;
8225  LRESULT lRet = 0;
8226  switch(lpDragListInfo->uNotification)
8227  {
8228  case DL_BEGINDRAG:
8229  lRet = (LPARAM)pT->OnBeginDrag((int)wParam, lpDragListInfo->hWnd, lpDragListInfo->ptCursor);
8230  break;
8231  case DL_CANCELDRAG:
8232  pT->OnCancelDrag((int)wParam, lpDragListInfo->hWnd, lpDragListInfo->ptCursor);
8233  break;
8234  case DL_DRAGGING:
8235  lRet = (LPARAM)pT->OnDragging((int)wParam, lpDragListInfo->hWnd, lpDragListInfo->ptCursor);
8236  break;
8237  case DL_DROPPED:
8238  pT->OnDropped((int)wParam, lpDragListInfo->hWnd, lpDragListInfo->ptCursor);
8239  break;
8240  default:
8241  ATLTRACE2(atlTraceUI, 0, _T("Unknown DragListBox notification\n"));
8242  bHandled = FALSE; // don't handle it
8243  break;
8244  }
8245  return lRet;
8246  }
8247 
8248 // Overrideables
8249  BOOL OnBeginDrag(int /*nCtlID*/, HWND /*hWndDragList*/, POINT /*ptCursor*/)
8250  {
8251  return TRUE; // allow dragging
8252  }
8253 
8254  void OnCancelDrag(int /*nCtlID*/, HWND /*hWndDragList*/, POINT /*ptCursor*/)
8255  {
8256  // nothing to do
8257  }
8258 
8259  int OnDragging(int /*nCtlID*/, HWND /*hWndDragList*/, POINT /*ptCursor*/)
8260  {
8261  return 0; // don't change cursor
8262  }
8263 
8264  void OnDropped(int /*nCtlID*/, HWND /*hWndDragList*/, POINT /*ptCursor*/)
8265  {
8266  // nothing to do
8267  }
8268 };
8269 
8270 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
8271 
8272 
8274 // CReBarCtrl
8275 
8276 template <class TBase>
8277 class CReBarCtrlT : public TBase
8278 {
8279 public:
8280 // Constructors
8281  CReBarCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
8282  { }
8283 
8284  CReBarCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
8285  {
8286  m_hWnd = hWnd;
8287  return *this;
8288  }
8289 
8290  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
8291  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
8292  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
8293  {
8294  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
8295  }
8296 
8297 // Attributes
8298  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
8299  {
8300  return REBARCLASSNAME;
8301  }
8302 
8303  UINT GetBandCount() const
8304  {
8305  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8306  return (UINT)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_GETBANDCOUNT, 0, 0L);
8307  }
8308

8333  CImageList GetImageList() const
8334  {
8335  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8336  REBARINFO rbi = { 0 };
8337  rbi.cbSize = sizeof(REBARINFO);
8338  rbi.fMask = RBIM_IMAGELIST;
8339  if( (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_GETBARINFO, 0, (LPARAM)&rbi) == FALSE ) return CImageList();
8340  return CImageList(rbi.himl);
8341  }
8342 
8343  BOOL SetImageList(HIMAGELIST hImageList)
8344  {
8345  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8346  REBARINFO rbi = { 0 };
8347  rbi.cbSize = sizeof(REBARINFO);
8348  rbi.fMask = RBIM_IMAGELIST;
8349  rbi.himl = hImageList;
8350  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_SETBARINFO, 0, (LPARAM)&rbi);
8351  }

8496 // Operations
8497  BOOL InsertBand(int nBand, LPREBARBANDINFO lprbbi)
8498  {
8499  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8500  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_INSERTBAND, nBand, (LPARAM)lprbbi);
8501  }
8502 
8503  BOOL AddBand(LPREBARBANDINFO lprbbi)
8504  {
8505  return InsertBand(-1, lprbbi);
8506  }
8507

8509  {
8510  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8511  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_DELETEBAND, nBand, 0L);
8512  }

8517  return ATL::CWindow((HWND)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_SETPARENT, (WPARAM)hWnd, 0L));
8518  }
8519 
8520 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
8521  void BeginDrag(int nBand, DWORD dwPos)
8522  {
8523  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8524  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_BEGINDRAG, nBand, dwPos);
8525  }
8526 
8527  void BeginDrag(int nBand, int xPos, int yPos)
8528  {
8529  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8530  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_BEGINDRAG, nBand, MAKELPARAM(xPos, yPos));
8531  }
8532 
8533  void EndDrag()
8534  {
8535  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8536  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_ENDDRAG, 0, 0L);
8537  }
8538 
8539  void DragMove(DWORD dwPos)
8540  {
8541  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8542  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_DRAGMOVE, 0, dwPos);
8543  }
8544

8546  {
8547  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8548  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_DRAGMOVE, 0, MAKELPARAM(xPos, yPos));
8549  }

8556  }
8557 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
8558 
8559  void MaximizeBand(int nBand, BOOL bIdeal = FALSE)
8560  {
8561  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8562  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_MAXIMIZEBAND, nBand, bIdeal);
8563  }
8564 
8565  void MinimizeBand(int nBand)
8566  {
8567  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8568  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_MINIMIZEBAND, nBand, 0L);
8569  }
8570 
8571  BOOL SizeToRect(LPRECT lpRect)
8572  {
8573  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8574  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_SIZETORECT, 0, (LPARAM)lpRect);
8575  }
8576 
8577  int IdToIndex(UINT uBandID) const
8578  {
8579  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8580  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_IDTOINDEX, uBandID, 0L);
8581  }
8582 
8583  int HitTest(LPRBHITTESTINFO lprbht) const
8584  {
8585  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8586  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_HITTEST, 0, (LPARAM)lprbht);
8587  }
8588 
8589  BOOL ShowBand(int nBand, BOOL bShow)
8590  {
8591  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8592  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_SHOWBAND, nBand, bShow);
8593  }
8594 
8595 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
8596  BOOL MoveBand(int nBand, int nNewPos)
8597  {
8598  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8599  ATLASSERT(nNewPos >= 0 && nNewPos <= ((int)GetBandCount() - 1));
8600  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_MOVEBAND, nBand, nNewPos);
8601  }
8602 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
8603 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
8604 
8605 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
8606  void PushChevron(int nBand, LPARAM lAppValue)
8607  {
8608  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8609  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_PUSHCHEVRON, nBand, lAppValue);
8610  }
8611 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
8612 
8613 // Extra operations
8614 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
8615  void LockBands(bool bLock)
8616  {
8617  int nBandCount = GetBandCount();
8618  for(int i =0; i < nBandCount; i++)
8619  {
8620  REBARBANDINFO rbbi = { RunTimeHelper::SizeOf_REBARBANDINFO() };
8621  rbbi.fMask = RBBIM_STYLE;
8622  BOOL bRet = GetBandInfo(i, &rbbi);
8623  ATLASSERT(bRet);
8624 
8625  if((rbbi.fStyle & RBBS_GRIPPERALWAYS) == 0)
8626  {
8627  rbbi.fStyle |= RBBS_GRIPPERALWAYS;
8628  bRet = SetBandInfo(i, &rbbi);
8629  ATLASSERT(bRet);
8630  rbbi.fStyle &= ~RBBS_GRIPPERALWAYS;
8631  }
8632 
8633  if(bLock)
8634  rbbi.fStyle |= RBBS_NOGRIPPER;
8635  else
8636  rbbi.fStyle &= ~RBBS_NOGRIPPER;
8637 
8638  bRet = SetBandInfo(i, &rbbi);
8639  ATLASSERT(bRet);
8640  }
8641  }
8642 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
8643 
8644 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
8645  BOOL SetBandWidth(int nBand, int cxWidth)
8646  {
8647  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8648  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, RB_SETBANDWIDTH, nBand, cxWidth);
8649  }
8650 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0600)
8651 };
8652 
8653 typedef CReBarCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CReBarCtrl;
8654 
8655 
8657 // CComboBoxEx
8658 
8659 #ifndef _WIN32_WCE
8660 
8661 template <class TBase>
8662 class CComboBoxExT : public CComboBoxT< TBase >
8663 {
8664 public:
8665 // Constructors
8666  CComboBoxExT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : CComboBoxT< TBase >(hWnd)
8667  { }
8668 
8669  CComboBoxExT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
8670  {
8671  m_hWnd = hWnd;
8672  return *this;
8673  }
8674 
8675  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
8676  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
8677  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
8678  {
8679  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
8680  }
8681 
8682 // Attributes
8683  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
8684  {
8685  return WC_COMBOBOXEX;
8686  }
8687 
8688  CImageList GetImageList() const
8689  {
8690  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8691  return CImageList((HIMAGELIST)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETIMAGELIST, 0, 0L));
8692  }
8693 
8694  CImageList SetImageList(HIMAGELIST hImageList)
8695  {
8696  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8697  return CImageList((HIMAGELIST)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_SETIMAGELIST, 0, (LPARAM)hImageList));
8698  }
8699 
8700 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
8701  DWORD GetExtendedStyle() const
8702  {
8703  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8704  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETEXTENDEDSTYLE, 0, 0L);
8705  }
8706

8708  {
8709  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8710  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_SETEXTENDEDSTYLE, dwExMask, dwExStyle);
8711  }
8712 
8713  BOOL GetUnicodeFormat() const
8714  {

8717  }

8723  }
8724 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
8725

8728  {

8730  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_SETWINDOWTHEME, 0, (LPARAM)lpstrTheme);

8733 
8734 // Operations
8735  int InsertItem(const COMBOBOXEXITEM* lpcCBItem)
8736  {
8737  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8738  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_INSERTITEM, 0, (LPARAM)lpcCBItem);
8739  }
8740 
8741  int InsertItem(UINT nMask, int nIndex, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage, int nSelImage,
8742  int iIndent, int iOverlay, LPARAM lParam)
8743  {
8744  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8745  COMBOBOXEXITEM cbex = { 0 };
8746  cbex.mask = nMask;
8747  cbex.iItem = nIndex;
8748  cbex.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
8749  cbex.iImage = nImage;
8750  cbex.iSelectedImage = nSelImage;
8751  cbex.iIndent = iIndent;
8752  cbex.iOverlay = iOverlay;
8753  cbex.lParam = lParam;
8754  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_INSERTITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&cbex);
8755  }
8756 
8757  int InsertItem(int nIndex, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage, int nSelImage, int iIndent, LPARAM lParam = 0)
8758  {
8759  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8760  COMBOBOXEXITEM cbex = { 0 };
8761  cbex.mask = CBEIF_TEXT | CBEIF_IMAGE | CBEIF_SELECTEDIMAGE | CBEIF_INDENT | CBEIF_LPARAM;
8762  cbex.iItem = nIndex;
8763  cbex.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
8764  cbex.iImage = nImage;
8765  cbex.iSelectedImage = nSelImage;
8766  cbex.iIndent = iIndent;
8767  cbex.lParam = lParam;
8768  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_INSERTITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&cbex);
8769  }
8770 
8771  int AddItem(UINT nMask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage, int nSelImage, int iIndent, int iOverlay, LPARAM lParam)
8772  {
8773  return InsertItem(nMask, -1, lpszItem, nImage, nSelImage, iIndent, iOverlay, lParam);
8774  }
8775 
8776  int AddItem(LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage, int nSelImage, int iIndent, LPARAM lParam = 0)
8777  {
8778  return InsertItem(-1, lpszItem, nImage, nSelImage, iIndent, lParam);
8779  }
8780 
8781  int DeleteItem(int nIndex)
8782  {
8783  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8784  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_DELETEITEM, nIndex, 0L);
8785  }
8786 
8787  BOOL GetItem(PCOMBOBOXEXITEM pCBItem) const
8788  {
8789  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8790  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)pCBItem);
8791  }
8792 
8793  BOOL SetItem(const COMBOBOXEXITEM* lpcCBItem)
8794  {
8795  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8796  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_SETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)lpcCBItem);
8797  }
8798 
8799  int SetItem(int nIndex, UINT nMask, LPCTSTR lpszItem, int nImage, int nSelImage,
8800  int iIndent, int iOverlay, LPARAM lParam)
8801  {
8802  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8803  COMBOBOXEXITEM cbex = { 0 };
8804  cbex.mask = nMask;
8805  cbex.iItem = nIndex;
8806  cbex.pszText = (LPTSTR) lpszItem;
8807  cbex.iImage = nImage;
8808  cbex.iSelectedImage = nSelImage;
8809  cbex.iIndent = iIndent;
8810  cbex.iOverlay = iOverlay;
8811  cbex.lParam = lParam;
8812  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_SETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&cbex);
8813  }
8814 
8815  BOOL GetItemText(int nIndex, LPTSTR lpszItem, int nLen) const
8816  {
8817  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8818  ATLASSERT(lpszItem != NULL);
8819 
8820  COMBOBOXEXITEM cbex = { 0 };
8821  cbex.mask = CBEIF_TEXT;
8822  cbex.iItem = nIndex;
8823  cbex.pszText = lpszItem;
8824  cbex.cchTextMax = nLen;
8825 
8826  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&cbex);
8827  }
8828 
8829 #ifndef _ATL_NO_COM
8830  BOOL GetItemText(int nIndex, BSTR& bstrText) const
8831  {
8832  USES_CONVERSION;
8833  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8834  ATLASSERT(bstrText == NULL);
8835 
8836  COMBOBOXEXITEM cbex = { 0 };
8837  cbex.mask = CBEIF_TEXT;
8838  cbex.iItem = nIndex;
8839 
8840  LPTSTR lpstrText = NULL;
8841  BOOL bRet = FALSE;
8842  for(int nLen = 256; ; nLen *= 2)
8843  {
8844  ATLTRY(lpstrText = new TCHAR[nLen]);
8845  if(lpstrText == NULL)
8846  break;
8847  lpstrText[0] = NULL;
8848  cbex.pszText = lpstrText;
8849  cbex.cchTextMax = nLen;
8850  bRet = (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&cbex);
8851  if(!bRet || (lstrlen(cbex.pszText) < nLen - 1))
8852  break;
8853  delete [] lpstrText;
8854  lpstrText = NULL;
8855  }
8856 
8857  if(lpstrText != NULL)
8858  {
8859  if(bRet)
8860  bstrText = ::SysAllocString(T2OLE(lpstrText));
8861  delete [] lpstrText;
8862  }
8863 
8864  return (bstrText != NULL) ? TRUE : FALSE;
8865  }
8866 #endif // !_ATL_NO_COM
8867 
8868 #if defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
8869  BOOL GetItemText(int nIndex, _CSTRING_NS::CString& strText) const
8870  {
8871  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8872 
8873  COMBOBOXEXITEM cbex = { 0 };
8874  cbex.mask = CBEIF_TEXT;
8875  cbex.iItem = nIndex;
8876 
8877  strText.Empty();
8878  BOOL bRet = FALSE;
8879  for(int nLen = 256; ; nLen *= 2)
8880  {
8881  cbex.pszText = strText.GetBufferSetLength(nLen);
8882  if(cbex.pszText == NULL)
8883  {
8884  bRet = FALSE;
8885  break;
8886  }
8887  cbex.cchTextMax = nLen;
8888  bRet = (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)&cbex);
8889  if(!bRet || (lstrlen(cbex.pszText) < nLen - 1))
8890  break;
8891  }
8892  strText.ReleaseBuffer();
8893  return bRet;
8894  }
8895 #endif // defined(_WTL_USE_CSTRING) || defined(__ATLSTR_H__)
8896 
8897  BOOL SetItemText(int nIndex, LPCTSTR lpszItem)
8898  {
8899  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8900  return SetItem(nIndex, CBEIF_TEXT, lpszItem, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
8901  }
8902 
8903  CComboBox GetComboCtrl() const
8904  {
8905  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8906  return CComboBox((HWND)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETCOMBOCONTROL, 0, 0L));
8907  }
8908 
8909  CEdit GetEditCtrl() const
8910  {
8911  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8912  return CEdit((HWND)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_GETEDITCONTROL, 0, 0L));
8913  }
8914 
8915  BOOL HasEditChanged() const
8916  {
8917  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
8918  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, CBEM_HASEDITCHANGED, 0, 0L);
8919  }
8920 
8921 // Non-functional
8922  int AddString(LPCTSTR /*lpszItem*/)
8923  {
8924  ATLASSERT(FALSE); // Not available in CComboBoxEx; use InsertItem
8925  return 0;
8926  }
8927 
8928  int InsertString(int /*nIndex*/, LPCTSTR /*lpszString*/)
8929  {
8930  ATLASSERT(FALSE); // Not available in CComboBoxEx; use InsertItem
8931  return 0;
8932  }
8933 
8934  int Dir(UINT /*attr*/, LPCTSTR /*lpszWildCard*/)
8935  {
8936  ATLASSERT(FALSE); // Not available in CComboBoxEx
8937  return 0;
8938  }
8939 
8940  int FindString(int /*nStartAfter*/, LPCTSTR /*lpszString*/) const
8941  {
8942  ATLASSERT(FALSE); // Not available in CComboBoxEx; try FindStringExact
8943  return 0;
8944  }
8945 };
8946 
8947 typedef CComboBoxExT<ATL::CWindow> CComboBoxEx;
8948 
8949 #endif // !_WIN32_WCE
8950 
8951 
8953 // CMonthCalendarCtrl
8954 
8955 template <class TBase>
8956 class CMonthCalendarCtrlT : public TBase
8957 {
8958 public:
8959 // Constructors
8960  CMonthCalendarCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
8961  { }
8962 
8963  CMonthCalendarCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
8964  {
8965  m_hWnd = hWnd;
8966  return *this;
8967  }
8968 
8969  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
8970  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
8971  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
8972  {
8973  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
8974  }

8978  {

8980  }

9010  if(pbLocaleVal != NULL)
9011  *pbLocaleVal = (BOOL)HIWORD(dwRet);
9012  return (int)(short)LOWORD(dwRet);
9013  }

9127  }
9128 
9129  BOOL GetCalendarGridInfo(PMCGRIDINFO pGridInfo) const
9130  {
9131  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9132  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, MCM_GETCALENDARGRIDINFO, 0, (LPARAM)pGridInfo);
9133  }
9134 
9135  CALID GetCALID() const
9136  {
9137  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9138  return (CALID)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, MCM_GETCALID, 0, 0L);
9139  }
9140

9142  {
9143  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9144  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, MCM_SETCALID, (LPARAM)calid, 0L);
9145  }

9148  {

9151  }

9154  {

9156  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, MCM_SETCALENDARBORDER, (WPARAM)bSet, (LPARAM)cxyBorder);
9157  }
9158 #endif // defined(NTDDI_VERSION) && (NTDDI_VERSION >= NTDDI_LONGHORN)

9162  {

9174  {
9175  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9176  return (DWORD)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, MCM_HITTEST, 0, (LPARAM)pMCHitTest);
9177  }

9181  {

9203  {

9205  return *this;
9206  }
9207

9209  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
9210  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
9211  {
9212  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
9213  }

9318 
9320 // CFlatScrollBarImpl - support for flat scroll bars
9321 
9322 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
9323 
9324 template <class T>
9325 class CFlatScrollBarImpl
9326 {
9327 public:
9328 // Initialization
9329  BOOL FlatSB_Initialize()
9330  {
9331  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9332  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9333  return ::InitializeFlatSB(pT->m_hWnd);
9334  }
9335 
9336  HRESULT FlatSB_Uninitialize()
9337  {
9338  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9339  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9340  return ::UninitializeFlatSB(pT->m_hWnd);
9341  }
9342 
9343 // Flat scroll bar properties
9344  BOOL FlatSB_GetScrollProp(UINT uIndex, LPINT lpnValue) const
9345  {
9346  const T* pT = static_cast<const T*>(this);
9347  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9348  return ::FlatSB_GetScrollProp(pT->m_hWnd, uIndex, lpnValue);
9349  }
9350 
9351  BOOL FlatSB_SetScrollProp(UINT uIndex, int nValue, BOOL bRedraw = TRUE)
9352  {
9353  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9354  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9355  return ::FlatSB_SetScrollProp(pT->m_hWnd, uIndex, nValue, bRedraw);
9356  }
9357 
9358 // Attributes
9359  int FlatSB_GetScrollPos(int nBar) const
9360  {
9361  const T* pT = static_cast<const T*>(this);
9362  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9363  return ::FlatSB_GetScrollPos(pT->m_hWnd, nBar);
9364  }
9365 
9366  int FlatSB_SetScrollPos(int nBar, int nPos, BOOL bRedraw = TRUE)
9367  {
9368  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9369  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9370  return ::FlatSB_SetScrollPos(pT->m_hWnd, nBar, nPos, bRedraw);
9371  }
9372 
9373  BOOL FlatSB_GetScrollRange(int nBar, LPINT lpMinPos, LPINT lpMaxPos) const
9374  {
9375  const T* pT = static_cast<const T*>(this);
9376  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9377  return ::FlatSB_GetScrollRange(pT->m_hWnd, nBar, lpMinPos, lpMaxPos);
9378  }
9379 
9380  BOOL FlatSB_SetScrollRange(int nBar, int nMinPos, int nMaxPos, BOOL bRedraw = TRUE)
9381  {
9382  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9383  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9384  return ::FlatSB_SetScrollRange(pT->m_hWnd, nBar, nMinPos, nMaxPos, bRedraw);
9385  }
9386 
9387  BOOL FlatSB_GetScrollInfo(int nBar, LPSCROLLINFO lpScrollInfo) const
9388  {
9389  const T* pT = static_cast<const T*>(this);
9390  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9391  return ::FlatSB_GetScrollInfo(pT->m_hWnd, nBar, lpScrollInfo);
9392  }
9393 
9394  int FlatSB_SetScrollInfo(int nBar, LPSCROLLINFO lpScrollInfo, BOOL bRedraw = TRUE)
9395  {
9396  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9397  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9398  return ::FlatSB_SetScrollInfo(pT->m_hWnd, nBar, lpScrollInfo, bRedraw);
9399  }
9400 
9401 // Operations
9402  BOOL FlatSB_ShowScrollBar(UINT nBar, BOOL bShow = TRUE)
9403  {
9404  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9405  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9406  return ::FlatSB_ShowScrollBar(pT->m_hWnd, nBar, bShow);
9407  }
9408 
9409  BOOL FlatSB_EnableScrollBar(UINT uSBFlags, UINT uArrowFlags = ESB_ENABLE_BOTH)
9410  {
9411  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9412  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(pT->m_hWnd));
9413  return ::FlatSB_EnableScrollBar(pT->m_hWnd, uSBFlags, uArrowFlags);
9414  }
9415 };
9416 
9417 template <class TBase>
9418 class CFlatScrollBarT : public TBase, public CFlatScrollBarImpl<CFlatScrollBarT< TBase > >
9419 {
9420 public:
9421  CFlatScrollBarT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
9422  { }
9423 
9424  CFlatScrollBarT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
9425  {
9426  m_hWnd = hWnd;
9427  return *this;
9428  }
9429 };
9430 
9431 typedef CFlatScrollBarT<ATL::CWindow> CFlatScrollBar;
9432 
9433 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)

9438 
9439 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)

9447  { }

9450  {
9451  m_hWnd = hWnd;
9452  return *this;
9453  }
9454 
9455  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
9456  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
9457  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
9458  {
9459  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
9460  }
