9463  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
9464  {
9465  return WC_IPADDRESS;
9466  }
9467 
9468  BOOL IsBlank() const
9469  {
9470  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9471  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_ISBLANK, 0, 0L);
9472  }
9473

9475  {
9476  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9477  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_GETADDRESS, 0, (LPARAM)lpdwAddress);
9478  }

9481  {
9482  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9483  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_SETADDRESS, 0, dwAddress);
9484  }
9485 
9486  void ClearAddress()
9487  {
9488  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9489  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_CLEARADDRESS, 0, 0L);
9490  }
9491 
9492  void SetRange(int nField, WORD wRange)
9493  {
9494  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9495  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_SETRANGE, nField, wRange);
9496  }
9497 
9498  void SetRange(int nField, BYTE nMin, BYTE nMax)
9499  {
9500  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9501  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_SETRANGE, nField, MAKEIPRANGE(nMin, nMax));
9502  }
9503 
9504  void SetFocus(int nField)
9505  {
9506  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9507  ::SendMessage(m_hWnd, IPM_SETFOCUS, nField, 0L);
9508  }
9509 };

9636 // CLinkCtrl - Windows SYSLINK control
9637 
9638 #if (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
9639 
9640 template <class TBase>
9641 class CLinkCtrlT : public TBase
9642 {
9643 public:
9644 // Constructors
9645  CLinkCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd)
9646  { }
9647 
9648  CLinkCtrlT< TBase >& operator =(HWND hWnd)
9649  {
9650  m_hWnd = hWnd;
9651  return *this;
9652  }
9653 
9654  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, ATL::_U_RECT rect = NULL, LPCTSTR szWindowName = NULL,
9655  DWORD dwStyle = 0, DWORD dwExStyle = 0,
9656  ATL::_U_MENUorID MenuOrID = 0U, LPVOID lpCreateParam = NULL)
9657  {
9658  return TBase::Create(GetWndClassName(), hWndParent, rect.m_lpRect, szWindowName, dwStyle, dwExStyle, MenuOrID.m_hMenu, lpCreateParam);
9659  }
9660 
9661 // Attributes
9662  static LPCTSTR GetWndClassName()
9663  {
9664 #ifdef _UNICODE
9665  return WC_LINK;
9666 #else // !_UNICODE
9667  return "SysLink";
9668 #endif // !_UNICODE
9669  }
9670 
9671  int GetIdealHeight(int cxMaxWidth = 0) const
9672  {
9673  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9674  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, LM_GETIDEALHEIGHT, cxMaxWidth, 0L);
9675  }
9676 
9677  BOOL GetItem(PLITEM pLItem) const
9678  {
9679  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9680  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, LM_GETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)pLItem);
9681  }
9682 
9683  BOOL SetItem(PLITEM pLItem)
9684  {
9685  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9686  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, LM_SETITEM, 0, (LPARAM)pLItem);
9687  }
9688 
9689  // Vista only
9690  int GetIdealSize(SIZE& size, int cxMaxWidth = 0) const
9691  {
9692 #ifndef LM_GETIDEALSIZE
9693  const UINT LM_GETIDEALSIZE = LM_GETIDEALHEIGHT;
9694 #endif
9695  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9696  return (int)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, LM_GETIDEALSIZE, cxMaxWidth, (LPARAM)&size);
9697  }
9698 
9699 // Operations
9700  BOOL HitTest(PLHITTESTINFO pLHitTestInfo) const
9701  {
9702  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9703  return (BOOL)::SendMessage(m_hWnd, LM_HITTEST, 0, (LPARAM)pLHitTestInfo);
9704  }
9705 };
9706 
9707 typedef CLinkCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CLinkCtrl;
9708 
9709 #endif // (_WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501) && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)

9711 
9713 // CCustomDraw - MI class for custom-draw support
9714 
9715 template <class T>
9716 class CCustomDraw
9717 {
9718 public:
9719 #if (_ATL_VER < 0x0700)
9720  BOOL m_bHandledCD;
9721 
9722  BOOL IsMsgHandled() const
9723  {
9724  return m_bHandledCD;
9725  }
9726 
9727  void SetMsgHandled(BOOL bHandled)
9728  {
9729  m_bHandledCD = bHandled;
9730  }
9731 #endif // !(_ATL_VER < 0x0700)
9732 
9733 // Message map and handlers
9734  BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CCustomDraw< T >)
9735  NOTIFY_CODE_HANDLER(NM_CUSTOMDRAW, OnCustomDraw)
9736  ALT_MSG_MAP(1)
9737  REFLECTED_NOTIFY_CODE_HANDLER(NM_CUSTOMDRAW, OnCustomDraw)
9738  END_MSG_MAP()
9739 
9740 // message handler
9741  LRESULT OnCustomDraw(int idCtrl, LPNMHDR pnmh, BOOL& bHandled)
9742  {
9743  T* pT = static_cast<T*>(this);
9744  pT->SetMsgHandled(TRUE);
9745  LPNMCUSTOMDRAW lpNMCustomDraw = (LPNMCUSTOMDRAW)pnmh;
9746  DWORD dwRet = 0;
9747  switch(lpNMCustomDraw->dwDrawStage)
9748  {
9749  case CDDS_PREPAINT:
9750  dwRet = pT->OnPrePaint(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9751  break;
9752  case CDDS_POSTPAINT:
9753  dwRet = pT->OnPostPaint(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9754  break;
9755  case CDDS_PREERASE:
9756  dwRet = pT->OnPreErase(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9757  break;
9758  case CDDS_POSTERASE:
9759  dwRet = pT->OnPostErase(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9760  break;
9761  case CDDS_ITEMPREPAINT:
9762  dwRet = pT->OnItemPrePaint(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9763  break;
9764  case CDDS_ITEMPOSTPAINT:
9765  dwRet = pT->OnItemPostPaint(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9766  break;
9767  case CDDS_ITEMPREERASE:
9768  dwRet = pT->OnItemPreErase(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9769  break;
9770  case CDDS_ITEMPOSTERASE:
9771  dwRet = pT->OnItemPostErase(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9772  break;
9773 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
9774  case (CDDS_ITEMPREPAINT | CDDS_SUBITEM):
9775  dwRet = pT->OnSubItemPrePaint(idCtrl, lpNMCustomDraw);
9776  break;
9777 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
9778  default:
9779  pT->SetMsgHandled(FALSE);
9780  break;
9781  }
9782  bHandled = pT->IsMsgHandled();
9783  return dwRet;
9784  }
9785 
9786 // Overrideables
9787  DWORD OnPrePaint(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9788  {
9789  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9790  }
9791 
9792  DWORD OnPostPaint(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9793  {
9794  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9795  }
9796 
9797  DWORD OnPreErase(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9798  {
9799  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9800  }
9801 
9802  DWORD OnPostErase(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9803  {
9804  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9805  }
9806 
9807  DWORD OnItemPrePaint(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9808  {
9809  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9810  }
9811 
9812  DWORD OnItemPostPaint(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9813  {
9814  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9815  }
9816 
9817  DWORD OnItemPreErase(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9818  {
9819  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9820  }
9821 
9822  DWORD OnItemPostErase(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9823  {
9824  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9825  }
9826 
9827 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
9828  DWORD OnSubItemPrePaint(int /*idCtrl*/, LPNMCUSTOMDRAW /*lpNMCustomDraw*/)
9829  {
9830  return CDRF_DODEFAULT;
9831  }
9832 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
9833 };
9834 
9835 
9836 // --- Windows CE common controls ---
9837 
9838 #ifdef _WIN32_WCE
9839 
9841 // CCECommandBarCtrl
9842 
9843 template <class TBase>
9844 class CCECommandBarCtrlT : public TBase
9845 {
9846 public:
9847 // Constructors
9848  CCECommandBarCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd) { }
9849 
9850  CCECommandBarCtrlT< TBase >& operator=(HWND hWnd)
9851  {
9852  m_hWnd = hWnd;
9853  return *this;
9854  }
9855 
9856 // Attributes
9857  BOOL IsVisible() const
9858  {
9859  return IsWindowVisible();
9860  }
9861 
9862  int GetHeight() const
9863  {
9864  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9865  return ::CommandBar_Height(m_hWnd);
9866  }
9867 
9868  HMENU GetMenu(WORD wButton) const
9869  {
9870  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9871  return ::CommandBar_GetMenu(m_hWnd, wButton);
9872  }
9873 
9874 // Operations
9875  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, int nCmdBarID)
9876  {
9877  m_hWnd = ::CommandBar_Create(ModuleHelper::GetModuleInstance(), hWndParent, nCmdBarID);
9878  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9879  return m_hWnd;
9880  }
9881 
9882  void Destroy()
9883  {
9884  DestroyWindow();
9885  }
9886 
9887  BOOL Show(BOOL bShow = TRUE)
9888  {
9889  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9890  return ::CommandBar_Show(m_hWnd, bShow);
9891  }
9892 
9893  BOOL DrawMenuBar(WORD wButton)
9894  {
9895  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9896  return ::CommandBar_DrawMenuBar(m_hWnd, wButton);
9897  }
9898 
9899  BOOL AddAdornments(DWORD dwFlags = 0)
9900  {
9901  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9902  return ::CommandBar_AddAdornments(m_hWnd, dwFlags, 0);
9903  }
9904 
9905  int AddBitmap(int nBitmapID, int nNumImages)
9906  {
9907  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9908  return ::CommandBar_AddBitmap(m_hWnd, ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance(), nBitmapID, nNumImages, 16, 16);
9909  }
9910 
9911  BOOL AddButtons(UINT uNumButtons, LPTBBUTTON lpButtons)
9912  {
9913  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9914  return CommandBar_AddButtons(m_hWnd, uNumButtons, lpButtons);
9915  }
9916 
9917  BOOL AddToolTips(UINT uNumToolTips, LPTSTR lpToolTips)
9918  {
9919  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9920  return CommandBar_AddToolTips(m_hWnd, uNumToolTips, lpToolTips);
9921  }
9922 
9923  BOOL InsertButton(int nButton, LPTBBUTTON lpButton)
9924  {
9925  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9926  return CommandBar_InsertButton(m_hWnd, nButton, lpButton);
9927  }
9928 
9929  HWND InsertComboBox(int nWidth, UINT dwStyle, WORD wComboBoxID, WORD wButton)
9930  {
9931  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9932  return ::CommandBar_InsertComboBox(m_hWnd, ModuleHelper::GetModuleInstance(), nWidth, dwStyle, wComboBoxID, wButton);
9933  }
9934 
9935  BOOL InsertMenubar(WORD wMenuID, WORD wButton)
9936  {
9937  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9938  return ::CommandBar_InsertMenubar(m_hWnd, ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance(), wMenuID, wButton);
9939  }
9940 
9941  BOOL InsertMenubarEx(ATL::_U_STRINGorID menu, WORD wButton)
9942  {
9943  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9944  return ::CommandBar_InsertMenubarEx(m_hWnd, ModuleHelper::GetResourceInstance(), (LPTSTR)menu.m_lpstr, wButton);
9945  }
9946 
9947  BOOL IsCommandBarMessage(LPMSG lpMsg)
9948  {
9949  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9950  return ::IsCommandBarMessage(m_hWnd, lpMsg);
9951  }
9952 };
9953 
9954 #if defined(_AYGSHELL_H_) || defined(__AYGSHELL_H__) // PPC MenuBar
9955  typedef CCECommandBarCtrlT<CToolBarCtrl> CMenuBarCtrl;
9956 #else
9957  typedef CCECommandBarCtrlT<CToolBarCtrl> CCECommandBarCtrl;
9958 #endif // defined(_AYGSHELL_H_) || defined(__AYGSHELL_H__)

9961 // CCECommandBandsCtrl
9962 
9963 template <class TBase>
9964 class CCECommandBandsCtrlT : public TBase
9965 {
9966 public:
9967 // Constructors
9968  CCECommandBandsCtrlT(HWND hWnd = NULL) : TBase(hWnd) { }
9969 
9970  CCECommandBandsCtrlT< TBase >& operator=(HWND hWnd)
9971  {
9972  m_hWnd = hWnd;
9973  return *this;
9974  }
9975 
9976 // Attributes
9977  BOOL IsVisible() const
9978  {
9979  return IsWindowVisible();
9980  }
9981 
9982 #if (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
9983  UINT GetHeight() const
9984  {
9985  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9986  return CommandBands_Height(m_hWnd);
9987  }
9988 #endif // (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0400)
9989 
9990  HWND GetCommandBar(UINT uBand) const
9991  {
9992  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9993  return ::CommandBands_GetCommandBar(m_hWnd, uBand);
9994  }
9995 
9996  BOOL GetRestoreInformation(UINT uBand, LPCOMMANDBANDSRESTOREINFO pcbr) const
9997  {
9998  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
9999  return ::CommandBands_GetRestoreInformation(m_hWnd, uBand, pcbr);
10000  }
10001 
10002 // Operations
10003  HWND Create(HWND hWndParent, UINT wID, DWORD dwStyles, HIMAGELIST hImageList = NULL)
10004  {
10005  m_hWnd = ::CommandBands_Create(ModuleHelper::GetModuleInstance(), hWndParent, wID, dwStyles, hImageList);
10006  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
10007  return m_hWnd;
10008  }
10009 
10010  BOOL AddAdornments(DWORD dwFlags = 0, LPREBARBANDINFO prbbi = NULL)
10011  {
10012  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
10013  return ::CommandBands_AddAdornments(m_hWnd, ModuleHelper::GetModuleInstance(), dwFlags, prbbi);
10014  }
10015 
10016  BOOL AddBands(UINT uBandCount, LPREBARBANDINFO prbbi)
10017  {
10018  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
10019  return ::CommandBands_AddBands(m_hWnd, ModuleHelper::GetModuleInstance(), uBandCount, prbbi);
10020  }
10021 
10022  BOOL Show(BOOL bShow = TRUE)
10023  {
10024  ATLASSERT(::IsWindow(m_hWnd));
10025  return ::CommandBands_Show(m_hWnd, bShow);
10026  }
10027 };
10028 
10029 typedef CCECommandBandsCtrlT<ATL::CWindow> CCECommandBandsCtrl;
10030 
10031 #endif // _WIN32_WCE
